ygData.subject: Re: Diety Sketch???
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Carol Testa  To: EQ_Potters@onelist.com  Date: Thursday, July 08, 1999 8:22 AM Subject: [EQ_Potters]
ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Carol Testa <caroljt@...>
To: EQ_Potters@onelist.com <EQ_Potters@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, July 08, 1999 8:22 AM
Subject: [EQ_Potters] Diety Sketch???


>From: "Carol Testa" <caroljt@...>
>
>Does anyone know the answer to the question about what is made from Diety
>Sketches and how its made?
>
>Chrysiana
>Druid/Potter on Cazic Thule
>


Well, I haven't done this yet, 'cause it'll cost money and time but...

The wheel has 6 slots
3 of these are already spoken for :
Sketch
Water
Block of Clay (whichever size)

now the other 3 can be one of: empty, clay, glass shards, metal bits.

leaving 64 combinations * 3 sizes of block of clay = 192 possible
combinations.

This is assuming no item uses 2 different sizes of clay block.

exhaustive testing should find either a) the right recipe or b) that it's
broken, and doesn't make anything.
